body.p: R H Simmons Jr says that he has this day heard a letter to Gov Bramlet from M. D. Hay and so far as the same relates to indictment against M. D. Hay it is strictly true I am the o^n^ly commonwealths witness alive within the Jursdiction of the Court James Olney and myself enlisted in Federal Army Olney died at Calhoun & was discharged after batle of Shiloh James Fansshender and Wm Harris enlisted in Rebel Army Harris was killed at Shiloh if Fansshender is alive he is still in Rebel Army I suppose

R H ^his X mark^ Simmons
Test
John Strowd
